name: places/ChIJ23FO9t73wokRFNZdjUVCMPs
adrFormatAddress: 1880 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10029-5432, USA

originalText.text: The best machines around the area. All washers and dryers are brand new. From the staff to the owners, they are all very helpful and friendly. The big plus is that they are open 24 hours a day! Also, the place is well maintained. I see someone in the reviews bashing the place and it’s ridiculous how far off they are from the actual truth.

text.text: The best machines around the area. All washers and dryers are brand new. From the staff to the owners, they are all very helpful and friendly. originalText.text:
Phenomenal Customer Service!!! This laundromat is very clean, machines are superb, and you feel protected inside. It’s always a calm and quiet experience.

I washed clothes and a pair of my favorite (expensive) sneakers. I didn’t notice until I woke up, that I left my sneakers in the laundromat. I went over and the young lady working there, was very calm and patient; trying to help me. The other employee on duty; when I was there, found my sneakers and hid them for me! I was able to get them back! He’s such a kind, brilliant man!

This is my go-to laundromat. I’m satisfied with the service & will continue to spend my money there!

originalText.text:
This is the worst laundrymat I have ever done laundry in. The machines malfunction and do not rinse you clothes properly. The tap card they make customers use malfunctions and the machines steal your money. The staff is of no help and is rude that work here. SAVE YOUR MONEY
AND GO SOMEWHERE ELS. The orst laundrymat ever!!! I would give 0 stars if I could.

originalText.text: All machines are new, dryers are excellent. The place has air conditioner. The best thing you don't need to carry quarters. All the machines work with a card that can be refillable with cash, ebt cash, credit or debit cards. You pay $1 dollar for the card. Love it.

originalText.text: L have gone to so many Laundromat where l needed to have my clothes  dry and couldn't get to fine not one unless you wash pay then you could dry even when you don't have ,The owner  are so kind you could  wash and dry ,but go only needed to dry it work for me ,l won't give it three month now and l m still coming.
